request.description:
set objects in database
---
- Accepts body in `application/json`,`application/x-www-form-urlencoded` and `multipart/form-data` format.
- Supports batch operations. You can send multiple requests in one request body, this mode requires body `application/json` as array of objects formatted.
- Supports filterable resources. You can filter resources by using query parameters: `field[op]=value`. refer to [Query Parameters Explanation](https://github.com/getevo/restify/blob/master/docs/endpoints.md#query-parameters-explanation)
---
### Acceptable fields and their types:
| Field | Type | Description | Validation |
| ------ | ------ | ------ | ------ |
| `id` | int | `Primary Key`,`AutoIncrement`,`Default:`,`Size:64` | `none` |
| `UUID` | string | `Size:24` | `none` |
| `username` | string | `Size:255` | required |
| `password` | string | `Default:`,`Size:512` | `none` |
| `is_admin` | bool |  | `none` |
| `name` | string | `Size:255` | required,alpha |
| `email` | string | `Size:255` | required,email |
| `created_at` | time |  | `none` |
| `updated_at` | time |  | `none` |
| `deleted` | bool |  | `none` |
| `deleted_at` | time | `Accept Null` | `none` |
---
### Loadable Associations:
| Association | Type | URL Pattern |
| ------ | ------ | ------ |
| Orders | `has many` | associations=Orders |


more information: [Query Parameters Explanation](https://github.com/getevo/restify/blob/master/docs/endpoints.md#query-parameters-explanation)

return all objects in one call
---
- Supports filterable resources. You can filter resources by using query parameters: `field[op]=value`. refer to [Query Parameters Explanation](https://github.com/getevo/restify/blob/master/docs/endpoints.md#query-parameters-explanation)
---
### Loadable Associations:
| Association | Type | URL Pattern |
| ------ | ------ | ------ |
| Orders | `has many` | associations=Orders |


more information: [Query Parameters Explanation](https://github.com/getevo/restify/blob/master/docs/endpoints.md#query-parameters-explanation)

query.description: specify size of results (optional, default 10, max 100)
